mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_category WHERE status = '1' ORDER BY sort_order ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_category ( category_name, category_desc, category_icon, sort_order, status ) VALUES ( #{categoryName}, #{categoryDesc}, #{categoryIcon}, #{sortOrder}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_category SET category_name = #{categoryName}, category_desc = #{categoryDesc}, category_icon = #{categoryIcon}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, status = #{status} WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
